Html:
Is it possible to get the latest database schema?  I grabbed the latest code from source control and am getting an Invalid object name 'dbo.oxite_CMS_ContentItem' exception.

Thanks

Seems the oxcite_site is also way off from the latest source and the last Setup\Oxite.sql

Looks like several of the column names have been changed (SkinsPath, SkinsScriptsPath, SkinsStylesPath, Skin, AdminSkin, HasMultipleBlogs, PluginsPath)

Well I thought I was going to be a smartie by taking and attaching the included MDF from the latest source download and then do a backup and restore that backup to my server. But even after doing that I still get "Invalid object name 'dbo.oxite_CMS_ContentItem'."

Apologies.  We've been busy and I haven't had time to update the schema in the MDF.  We only update the scripts in /Setup for new releases, but I'll get the MDF updated later tonight (don't have time right now).
The schema is now updated for Oxite.
